name: mcp-local-rag
description: "primitive" RAG-like web search model context protocol (MCP) server that runs locally using Google's MediaPipe Text Embedder and DuckDuckGo Search. ✨ no APIs required ✨.

python.description: Specifies the Python version to use for running the server.

from.description: Indicates the source from which to clone or fetch the repository.
